l10n_infotext_consent1.en: You are authorizing certificate request/retrieval and access to your identify information for the following service and the following period of time:

l10n_infotext_consent2.en: If you did not request any certificate operation at a service called

l10n_infotext_consent3.en: or fitting to the above description, then it is possible that somebody tries to take over your identity in order to falsely get a certificate impersonating YOU!

l10n_infotext_consent4.en: In that case, please deny consent and

l10n_infotext_consent6.en: Please supply the above consumer information.
